LanguageData.Umbrella.label: umbrella
LanguageData.Umbrella.description: An umbrella: a cloth covering on a stick. Keeps colonists underneath it dry.
LanguageData.Parasol.label: parasol
LanguageData.Parasol.description: A decorative umbrella that provides a small social impact.
LanguageData.FoldableUmbrella.label: foldable umbrella
LanguageData.FoldableUmbrella.description: An umbrella held up by metal bars, that can fold when not in use.
LanguageData.FoldableParasol.label: foldable parasol
LanguageData.FoldableParasol.description: A fancy, folding parasol that shows off a pawn's wealth and provides a large social boost.
